Reviews.Title: “Not worth your savings”
Reviews.Author: LAtravelbug_11
Reviews.Content: Travelled during Thanksgiving 2011 and couldn't be more disappointed with this motel. I had my toddler travelling with me and my husband and wanted a non-smoking room, however, we could smell smoke all over the corridor and room we were given. It was the first unpleasant experience it this hotel - the rest followed as we entered our room: thin, darkish-white towels I was skeptical to use, bath tubs that had dirty scum at the bottom,dirty carpet and very stained pillows that were camouflaged by white pillow cases. I was almost afraid to use their linen but had no choice. Breakfast is so-so. The saving feature of this hotel is their very accommodating staff. This is a tired old hotel that needs renovation and new linen.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting !”
Reviews.Author: SDchick1
Reviews.Content: Definitely get what you pay for. Cheap price = cheap quality. I was afraid for myself and my family to sleep on the beds. We got two rooms with two queen beds each, they both had an odd smell to them. One beds blankets, sheets and pillows had hair all over them. One bed had what looked like old blood stains on the sheets and mattress cover. The heater blew cold air and the fridge was useless, it didn't close all the way. Not to mention the shower water was freezing then you'd get the water right and it would burn you. Never staying here again !!!

Reviews.Title: “great value”
Reviews.Author: lakerpimp619
Reviews.Content: I've been coming to this super8 for a couple years now and have seen good improvment under the new mangment. great front desk staff and freindly house keeping. great value for your money esspesially being close to the beach and downtown. WILL DEFINETLY COME BACK !!!

Reviews.Title: “Stay away!”
Reviews.Author: tjluv
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here just before Christmas. We normally stay at mid-price hotels like Choice or Holiday Inn, but this trip based on the economy and wanting to save money we thought that we would give this budget place a try. BIG MISTAKE. It took the girl (Aunt Jemimah look-a-like) almost a half and hour to check us in because she was more interested in visting with her friends than helping us. POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE. The room was average, clean, but smelled of stale beer and cigarette smoke, even though it was marked as non-smoking. The area has some nice restaurants, so we had dinner at a nice little mexican rest. and brought back to the room what we thought would be our midnite snack. When I woke up in the middle of the nite to eat the food, it was covered in ROACHES (literally 30-40 of them). YUCK...YUCK...YUCK. When I talked to the girl about it in the morning, she told me that I should have seen it a few months ago when there was a bigger INFESTATION and that they were working with a new pest control company. Many of the occupants seemed to be homeless people with many of them pushing shopping carts up and down the street as they collected their cans and transported their other belongings. The motel caters to these people by offering a cheap weekly rate. Lastly, their free breakfast in the morning features crusty bread and DAY-OLD muffins and danish.(I have worked in the grocery business for the last 25 years and know my day-old baked goods and these were them. Also they have a pool that was closed down by the health department . WHAT A DUMP. Our trip was to last for a week, but we cut our stay with this HELL HOLE short after two days. Unless you are totally desperate (as many of the occupants of this place seem to be, god bless them) go elsewhere. You will thank me for it> I Promise

Reviews.Title: “awful”
Reviews.Author: kathi913
Reviews.Content: Online pictures were misleading. Broken locks and windows. unfriendly night staff. Had 7 (ages 5-16) with us, but this was not a family hotel. Not a very good location. reviews on website we booked through were misleading (must have been the hotel owner who wrote the good reviews) would never recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Be wary of staying here”
Reviews.Author: SparklySilver
Reviews.Content: Now the hotel itself wasn't especially bad, the room was large and clean, the staff were friendly and helpful and the complimentary breakfast was good with a variety of items on offer. It's not in a good area though. At night there were kids hanging around on the car park. We went out for food nearby and felt very uncomfortable walking to and from the car both on the hotel car park and also at the pizza shop. And it wasn't until the following morning when we opened the curtains that we noticed how the window frame was pulled out of shape from where someone had tried to force it open from the outside.

Reviews.Title: “pretty gross!!!”
Reviews.Author: loripos
Reviews.Content: Located in a sketchy part of town (but close to the trolley to go downtown). got into the room which was a normal motel room and went to the bathroom (which had a sanitary seal on it) lifted the lid and there were OH YES spots of #2 on the NON CLEANED TOILET SEAT. The night staff was on the phone and acted as if we bothered them, the morning staff was very nice and helpful. Even with the air conditioner the room was very humid and smelled of mold.. would not recommend this motel.

Reviews.Title: “The WORST!”
Reviews.Author: jimandsid
Reviews.Content: We travel all over the United States. This place was very dirty and my husband and I both contracted a bad case of scabies here. (With a 7-day infestation period, the doctor pinpointed it to the very middle of our 11 day stay!) If the staff spent as much time attending to housekeeping issues as they do standing outside smoking, this place would be WAY BETTER OFF! I am still waiting on payment for medical bills. Photo online must be OLD! Awnings were falling off. Laundry was extremely dirty with sticky floors. I washed things down with bleach water so I could fold my clothes in there. Sold our RV last year due to gas prices, but seriously considering another one now!

Reviews.Title: “Dont understand the negative reviews- WE WILL BE BACK!”
Reviews.Author: sapphire_tyger
Reviews.Content: My kids and I stayed here and were a little leary about it due to the bad reviews others have written. We were very pleasantly surprised at the cleanliness and amenities offered at a very reasonable price. Also hotel is within a few minutes drive to Imperial Beach, which is a clean, non crowded beauty! Also close by is Coronado Island, and San Diego is a short trip away on I-5 which is to the east. The room was clean, air conditioned, and featured a large bath, fridge and micro as well as large TV set. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Our room as well as the property was safe and secure. To be this close to the beach during the summer and have clean, pleasant accomodations at below $80 a night, we say this place is great.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Don't be fooled by the photos, they must be really old. The hotel and rooms are in need of a face lift. The location is not the best, I didn't feel very safe. The worst part of the hotel is how dirty the rooms are. We only paid 71.00 a night so I didn't expect the hilton, but this place was a dump. The rooms were so dirty I expected to see roaches crawling on the walls. Spend a little more money and stay somewhere else. I wish I had read a bad review so I would have gone elsewhere. The only other review is good (someone from San Diego), must be the owner of the hotel. I wrote a bad review for this place at travelocity.com the never put it on the website. They only had good reviews. I guess there is a little conflict of interest there. I will never trust their reviews again, now that I know they don't post them all. Hopefully this will be posted here to save someone from the mistake we made.

Reviews.Title: “Great clean and friendly place”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Good Value for Money, new Managment have done a great job. Staff were friendly, and breakfast was good. rooms were clean.

HotelInfo.Name: Super 8 San Diego/South Bay
HotelInfo.Address: 1788 Palm Avenue, San Diego, CA 92154
